snippet: The bride works for a financial information services company and the bridegroom is a publicist for the United States Tennis Association.
lead_paragraph: Allison Beth Kelrick and Andrew Harold Labovitz were married Saturday evening at the Harbor Beach Marriott Resort & Spa, a hotel in Fort Lauderdale, Fla. Rabbi Jeffrey Kurtz-Lendner officiated, with Rabbi Ron Segal taking part. The bride, 28, is an assistant vice president specializing in regulatory affairs at Markit, a financial information services company in New York. She graduated from Emory and received a law degree from the Benjamin N. Cardozo School of Law at Yeshiva University.
